pma:database.name: levelup_newsvr
pma:database.pma:table: CREATE TABLE `PLAYERS` ( `idPlayer` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `name` varchar(20) NOT NULL, `password` varchar(20) NOT NULL, `nbOfView` mediumint(8) unsigned NOT NULL, `nbOfComment` mediumint(8) unsigned NOT NULL, `cmtPositionPref` tinyint(3) unsigned NOT NULL, `cmtNbShown` tinyint(3) unsigned NOT NULL, `lastPlayDate` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT current_timestamp(), PRIMARY KEY (`idPlayer`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=11 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4;
